mapper.select: SELECT id, author, subject, content, news_type, ref_id, approved, approved_by, approve_date, `like`, publish_date, creation_date, last_update_date FROM news WHERE news_type = #{newsType} and approved=1 order by publish_date DESC
select id from news where news_type=#{newsType} order by id desc limit 1,1;
SELECT id, subject, news_id, img_name, img_path, order WHERE available = 1 AND start_date >= #{startDate} AND end_date <= #{endDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (news_id,profile_id,comment,creation_date,last_update_date) VALUES (#{NewsId}, #{ProfileId}, #{comment}, now(), now())
